CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Dems chase California votes and dollars

04/28/07 08:19 PM, EDT
Presidential contender Barack Obama vowed Saturday to "turn the page on this Iraq disaster" while Hillary Rodham Clinton denounced President Bush's tenure as "one of the darkest blots on leadership we've ever had."
